comments:
[regression][deployment]ClassNotFound exception thrown when preview report using event handler[0800]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070406-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1.deploy WebViewExample to Tomcat 5.5.7
2.copy ResourceJava.jar to ScriptLib folder
3.deploy attached report design ,input in browser address:http://spm2003:8082/birt20070405/frameset?__report=event.rptdesign
Expected result:
event.rptdesign cab be previewed
Actual result:
Exception thrown
Error log:  
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following items have errors:

- Class com.labelscript.Label1Impl not found

Created an attachment (id=63147)
Report design to reproduce
I have checked 2.2.0 M5 build,it works.

I think it isn?t a regression bug. It will occur in all 2.2 builds.
Because from 2.2, we initialized report service instance when loaded web application.
If one web server contains more than one birt application, it will cause System.properties ret by many times.
So it is a workaround to disable it.
Not a regression bug. Waiting for engine fix.

Pass scriptlib classpath setting to EngineConfig. 
Don?t use System.setProperty.
